description: This video will talk about various aspects cared about when deciding upon an RDBMS product, and how Postgres shines in those areas: acquisition cost, product maturity, stability, development model, support options, unique features, performance, and extensibility.
short_description: This video will talk about various aspects cared about when deciding upon an RDBMS product, and how Postgres shines in those are
title: Gurjeet Singh: How Postgres is Different (read BETTER than) your database
